findings.message: Locale coverage counts are incorrect. Repo currently has 18 supported locales total (`apps/brikette/src/i18n.config.ts:7-27`) and 17 non-English locales, not "20 locales / 19 non-English".
The listed non-English locale set is 17 entries (`ar,da,de,es,fr,hi,hu,it,ja,ko,no,pl,pt,ru,sv,vi,zh`), but the text claims 19; this propagates to task sizing and translation scope.

Dependency map is internally contradictory ("used in two places â€¦ search confirms only imported in `BookPageContent.tsx`"). Current code shows a single consumer import (`apps/brikette/src/app/[lang]/book/BookPageContent.tsx:12`).

The statement that `book-page-perks-cta-order.test.tsx` "must be updated" is overstated; that test fully mocks `DirectPerksBlock` and can still pass unchanged unless new assertions are intentionally added.
